name: Diancie
description: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.

abilities.name: Magic Bounce
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon is targeted by a move flagged as being reflectable, the move is redirected to its user.  All reflectable moves are non-damaging, and most non-damaging moves that target other Pokémon are reflectable.  A move reflected by this ability or magic coat cannot be reflected back.
